title: Dua for Healing from All Diseases
bangla: Allahumma Rabban-nasi, adhhibil-ba'sa, washfi, antash-Shafi, la shifa'a illa shifa'uka, shifaan la yughadiru saqama.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ النَّاسِ، أَذْهِبِ الْبَأْسَ، اشْفِ، أَنْتَ الشَّافِي، لَا شِفَاءَ إِلَّا شِفَاؤُكَ، شِفَاءً لَا يُغَادِرُ سَقَمًا
transliteration: Allahumma Rabban-nasi, adhhibil-ba'sa, washfi, antash-Shafi, la shifa'a illa shifa'uka, shifaan la yughadiru saqama.
meaning: O Allah, Lord of mankind, remove the hardship and grant healing, for You are the Healer. There is no healing except Your healing, a healing that leaves no illness.

title: Dua for Protection from Serious Illness
bangla: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-barasi, wal-jununi, wal-judhami, wa min sayy'il-asqam.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْبَرَصِ، وَالْجُنُونِ، وَالْجُذَامِ، وَمِنْ سَيِّئِ الْأَسْقَامِ
transliteration: Allahumma inni a'udhu bika minal-barasi, wal-jununi, wal-judhami, wa min sayy'il-asqam.
meaning: O Allah, I seek refuge with You from leprosy, insanity, elephantiasis, and from evil diseases.

title: Dua from Quran for Healing
meaning: And when I am ill, it is He who cures me.

title: Dua for Patient and Healing
bangla: Rabbana aatinaa fiddunya hasanatan wa fil aakhirati hasanatan wa qinaa azaaban naar.
arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
transliteration: Rabbana aatinaa fiddunya hasanatan wa fil aakhirati hasanatan wa qinaa azaaban naar.
meaning: Our Lord, give us in this world good and in the Hereafter good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

title: Ruqyah for Healing
bangla: Bismillahi arqika, min kulli shay'in yu'dhika, min sharri kulli nafsin aw 'aynin hasidin, Allahu yashfika, bismillahi arqika.
arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ أَرْقِيكَ، مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ يُؤْذِيكَ، مِنْ شَرِّ كُلِّ نَفْسٍ أَوْ عَيْنِ حَاسِدٍ، اللَّهُ يَشْفِيكَ، بِسْمِ اللَّهِ أَرْقِيكَ
transliteration: Bismillahi arqika, min kulli shay'in yu'dhika, min sharri kulli nafsin aw 'aynin hasidin, Allahu yashfika, bismillahi arqika.
meaning: In the name of Allah I perform ruqyah for you, from everything that harms you, from the evil of every soul or envious eye, may Allah heal you, in the name of Allah I perform ruqyah for you.

title: Dua for Relief from Pain
bangla: Allahumma rabbi-nnasi, mudhhibal-ba'si, ishfi anta ash-shafi, la shafia illa anta.
arabic: اللَّهُمَّ رَبَّ النَّاسِ، مُذْهِبَ الْبَأْسِ، اشْفِ أَنْتَ الشَّافِي، لَا شَافِيَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
transliteration: Allahumma rabbi-nnasi, mudhhibal-ba'si, ishfi anta ash-shafi, la shafia illa anta.
meaning: O Allah, Lord of people, Remover of harm, cure, You are the Curer. There is no curer but You.

title: Dua When Visiting Sick
bangla: La ba'sa, tahurun in sha' allah.
arabic: لَا بَأْسَ، طَهُورٌ إِنْ شَاءَ اللَّهُ
transliteration: La ba'sa, tahurun in sha' allah.
meaning: Do not worry, it is a purification (from sins) if Allah wills.

title: Dua for Protection from Evil Eye
bangla: A'udhu bi kalimatillahit-tammati min kulli shaytanin wa hammatin wa min kulli 'aynin lammatin.
arabic: أَعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّامَّاتِ مِنْ كُلِّ شَيْطَانٍ وَهَامَّةٍ، وَمِنْ كُلِّ عَيْنٍ لَامَّةٍ
transliteration: A'udhu bi kalimatillahit-tammati min kulli shaytanin wa hammatin wa min kulli 'aynin lammatin.
meaning: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from every devil and poisonous pest, and from every evil eye.

title: Dua for General Healing
bangla: Bismillah, turbatu ardina, biriqati ba'dina, yushfa bihi saqeemuna, bi-idhni rabbina.
arabic: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ، تُرْبَةُ أَرْضِنَا، بِرِيقَةِ بَعْضِنَا، يُشْفَىٰ بِهِ سَقِيمُنَا، بِإِذْنِ رَبِّنَا
transliteration: Bismillah, turbatu ardina, biriqati ba'dina, yushfa bihi saqeemuna, bi-idhni rabbina.
meaning: In the name of Allah, the dust of our land mixed with the saliva of one of us would cure our patient with the permission of our Lord.

title: Dua from Quran for Mercy and Healing
bangla: Rabbana afrigh 'alayna sabran wa thabbit aqdamana wansurna 'alal-qawmil-kafirin.
arabic: رَبَّنَا أَفْرِغْ عَلَيْنَا صَبْرًا وَثَبِّتْ أَقْدَامَنَا وَانصُرْنَا عَلَى الْقَوْمِ الْكَافِرِينَ
transliteration: Rabbana afrigh 'alayna sabran wa thabbit aqdamana wansurna 'alal-qawmil-kafirin.
meaning: Our Lord, pour upon us patience and plant firmly our feet and give us victory over the disbelieving people.
